text.autoconfig.autotranslation.title: §bAuto Translation
text.autoconfig.autotranslation.option.i: Screen Translation Ignore The Original Screen
It may affect performance. Try not to disable this option.
When turned off, only the icon is displayed when the current screen is translated, and when turned on, it is always displayed.
text.autoconfig.autotranslation.option.g: DNS configuration requires modifying the configuration file and is not displayed in the GUI.
checkbox.autotranslation.tooltip: Turn automatic translation on and off for this screen
commands.autotranslation.command.pack_re: Are you sure you want to package and apply the resource package? If a translation exists that has not been polished by humans, it can lead to misunderstandings.
The resource package is packaged and applied successfully.
There are no language files to package.
commands.autotranslation.command.error.p: Resource package packaging failed. Please check the log for specific reasons.
commands.autotranslation.command.tip.toB: Please enter §b/auto_translation confirm§r within %s seconds to confirm execution.
commands.autotranslation.command.tip.can: Unconfirmed, the instruction has been canceled!
